description:
Are you interested in shaping the future of food by producing new sustainable food ingredients with cutting edge technology and with superb colleagues who are top experts in their field? Onego Bio might be just the place for you.¬†¬†

¬†

Onego Bio is a Finnish leading food-biotech company producing animal-free egg protein with precision fermentation. The company's award-winning technology has placed them at the forefront of the industry, having cracked the code to producing bioidentical egg proteins that provide the same taste, functionality, and nutrition but without the poor efficiency and harmful impacts of animal agriculture. Onego Bio is launching its first product Bioalbumen¬Æ as an ingredient for the food industry and transforming the food system to meet the urgent sustainability requirements of the world. The company is focused on scaling precision fermentation to industrial scale with the superior Trichoderma reesei production platform.¬†

‚ÄØFounded by alternative protein pioneer Maija Itkonen (CEO) and precision fermentation trailblazer Christopher Landowski (CTO), Onego Bio is a spin-off that salutes the remarkable work done by VTT Technical Research Centre of Finland for the next level cellular agriculture products and applications. In April 2024 Onego raised a $40M Series A funding round (one of the largest in the Nordics) for fueling scale up and go-to-market in the US. Since launching,‚ÄØthe company‚ÄØhas received massive international recognition, including being selected as a winner of‚ÄØFast Company‚Äôs‚ÄØ2023 World Changing Ideas Awards. Onego Bio is a founding member of Food Fermentation Europe and Precision Fermentation Alliance US.‚ÄØGet to know us better‚ÄØby exploring our webpage‚ÄØwww.onego.bio/about-us¬†

¬†

We are now looking for a Senior Scientist to join our R&D team in Helsinki¬†

In this position, you will play an essential role in developing, planning, and carrying out research projects with a project team and contribute towards our greater goal of providing animal free egg protein ingredients to the world. Ultimately, we aim to be part of building a sustainable food system with the help of our partners throughout the world. Towards this goal our R&D team will create microbial production systems for expressing egg white proteins using filamentous fungi.¬†

¬†¬†

Your responsibilities as Senior Scientist:¬†¬†

 * Scientific project work in protein production with filamentous fungi.¬†
 * Using your expertise in molecular biology and strain engineering to create excellent fungal production strains for egg white proteins.¬†
 * Developing strain screening technologies and workflows for filamentous fungi.¬†
 * Further developing our fungal expression platforms using the newest innovations.¬†
 * Project team management.¬†
 * Working with our bioprocess team to improve the strains and bioprocess conditions.¬†

¬†

Who we are looking for:¬†

 * Proven, excellent laboratory skills and experience in molecular biology techniques such as DNA cloning, genome engineering, protein and possibly genome analysis.¬†
 * MSc or PhD in biotechnology, molecular biology, fungal biology, or related field.¬†¬†
 * Four or more years of experience working with filamentous fungi.¬†
 * Good written and spoken English skills.¬†
 * Proven ability to effectively instruct other scientists or technical staff.¬†
 * An innovative person who exhibits effective leadership skills and has experience leading others.¬†
 * Someone with deep knowledge in the fields of fungal biology and strain engineering.¬†
 * Skills in Bioinformatics are considered as a big plus as well as experience in working in an industrial biotechnology company.¬†

¬†

As a person, we hope that you:¬†

 * Independently plan your work and perform experiments skilfully and precisely.¬†
 * Self-motivated and willing to take the initiative to get projects accomplished.¬†¬†
 * Have strong communication and collaboration skills.¬†
 * Work well with other team members and contribute to a good working environment.¬†
 * Can tolerate pressure and maintain a good work-life balance.¬†
 * Are flexible to take on a variety of tasks anticipated in a start-up company.¬†

¬†

With Onego Bio, you‚Äôll‚ÄØenjoy:

 * Molecular biology with‚ÄØan‚ÄØimpact.‚ÄØOnego Bio works on creating cutting-edge microbial protein production systems. Microbial production technology to produce egg white protein shows potential to significantly mitigate environmental impacts up to 90% according to recent study published in¬†Nature Food. The positive impact of our technology does not only contribute positively on the environment but also supply chain stability, global health, food security and animal welfare. Egg is one of the world‚Äôs most popular proteins and our team stands to meet the demand in a way that preserves the future of our planet.¬†
 * Superb colleagues. We offer working in a passionate environment within a fun and diverse team who want to make an impact in the world. With Onego Bio, you will join a dedicated group of top experts in their respective fields who foster a culture of trust, openness, and sharing ideas.¬†
 * Competitive salary. We want to attract the best people, so we will provide competitive salaries.¬†¬†
 * Nordic work‚Äìlife balance.‚ÄØWorking in‚ÄØFinland, the happiest country in the world, enables a‚ÄØhigh quality of life. At‚ÄØOnego Bio, we‚ÄØmake our people‚Äôs well-being a priority. We offer‚ÄØ6‚ÄØweeks paid vacation a year, among other benefits including extended occupational healthcare, and exercise and culture benefits.¬†

¬†

Apply now‚ÄØand‚ÄØjoin our community of brilliant minds!¬†

Please‚ÄØsend your CV and application letter as soon as possible‚ÄØbut‚ÄØat the latest by 30th of September 2024.‚ÄØWe will process applications as they come in and fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate.¬†

¬†

Interested and want to hear more?¬†

For further information, please contact Head of Biology, Taija Leinonen,¬†taija.leinonen@onego.bio¬†or Senior Scientist ‚Äì Strain Engineering, Tommi Kotila,¬†tommi.kotila@onego.bio¬†

¬†

Read more about our past work on the topic:¬†¬†

description:
This role required candidate to permanently relocate at Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.

About the Company



This company engages in the exploration, production, transportation, and sale of crude oil and natural gas. It operates through the following segments: Upstream, Downstream, and Corporate. The Upstream segment includes crude oil, natural gas and natural gas liquids exploration, field development, and production. The Downstream segment focuses on refining, logistics, power generation, and the marketing of crude oil, petroleum and petrochemical products, and related services to international and domestic customers. The Corporate segment offers supporting services including human resources, finance, and information technology. The company was founded on May 29, 1933 and is headquartered in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.

Job Summary

We are seeking a seasoned "Business System Analyst" to serve in the role of "Financial Data Scientist" to join the Digital Solutions & Data Management Division of the Digital Finance Department. Digital Finance Department (DFD) is responsible for the coordination, development, and management of information systems used in financial accounting, treasury, financial planning & forecasting, performance management, and the entire suite of digital solutions for the Finance Business line. Digital Implementation Division is responsible for providing program management services for implementation, rollout, and support of finance system solutions through digital technologies including advanced analytics, Robotic Process Automation (RPA), and Advanced Analytics technologies including Artificial Intelligence solutions and SAP solutions using Business Warehouse (BW) and Analytics Cloud (SAC). The department personnel are multidisciplinary professionals with a key focus on Financial Applications functional experience and IT technical background.

The Business System Analyst's primary role is to champion the identification, evaluation, design, coordinate implementation, and facilitate rollout of Artificial Intelligence-centric solutions in the Finance organization. The analyst will also lead implementation initiatives where required in addition to managing post-implementation support.

Responsibilities:

 * Design, develop, and implement AI-powered solutions to automate tasks, improve processes, and support data-driven decisions across Financial Accounting, Treasury, Performance Management, and Investor Relations.
 * Collaborate closely with business stakeholders to understand their needs, translate them into technical requirements, and deliver impactful solutions. Assess Finance AI use cases, evaluate options, and support implementation.
 * Develop and manage machine learning models for financial forecasting, fraud detection, risk assessment, and more.
 * Clean, transform, and analyze large datasets from diverse sources to ensure data quality and suitability for modeling.
 * Stay updated on AI and machine learning advancements, identifying potential applications for finance and proposing relevant pilot projects.
 * Effectively communicate technical concepts and findings to both technical and non-technical audiences.
 * Contribute to cross-functional initiatives integrating AI and data science into broader business transformation efforts.
 * Facilitate workshops with users and consultants to document processes and drive transformation.
 * Lead the delivery of key digital initiatives, participating in solution development through projects and programs in collaboration with business and technology teams.
 * Maintain, support, and optimize digital solutions.
   
   

Requirements:

 * This role required candidate to permanently relocate at Dhahran, Saudi Arabia.
 * Hold a Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or IT from a recognized program; advanced degree or professional certifications like MBA, CMA, CFA, CPA preferred but not required.
 * Possess 6-8 years of experience in Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, and advanced analytics implementation in financial systems.
 * Expertise in Python programming and libraries such as NumPy, pandas, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch is required.
 * Proficiency in UI programming, particularly with React, is required.
 * Desirable skills include leveraging Google Cloud or Azure Cloud for advanced analytics.
 * Demonstrate a thorough understanding of implementing AI systems in Finance, including benefits articulation, technical evaluation, critical success factors, and project risks.
 * Have project experience implementing AI solutions, including analyzing business requirements, evaluating technical options, and supporting execution processes.
 * Preferred ability to engage in hands-on technical solution management.

description:
What We Need

Oivan is looking for a Software Architect with at least 8 years of experience in the development of software development technologies, specifically in the areas of Google Cloud Platform, and microservices architecture. If you are interested in working with reputed clients and enjoy collaborating in a creative and awesome team, then Oivan is the right place for you! ‚ò∫Ô∏è

For this role, you will be reporting to our Delivery Director, Waleed Al Talib. This position requires you to go on international assignment or full-time relocation. We offer the salary as tax-free income between 140,000 - 200,000 TB per month, including housing allowance and transport provided in KSA.

What You'll Do

We offer you the unique opportunity to work and improve your skills with a diverse and geographically distributed team of technology and business experts around the world. You will get to work on our largest project in the real-estate industry, supervising the work of over 30 developers across six different teams. In addition, these are some of the following expectations:


 * Collaborate with the development teams to define and implement technical requirements for the microservices architecture, including deployment strategies, monitoring, and instrumentation.
 * Analyze the existing system architecture and recommend improvements to enhance performance, scalability, and maintainability.
 * Design, implement, and maintain new products and services using but not limited to Ruby on Rails (or Golang) for the backend and Angular for the frontend
 * Develop technical specifications and design documents to guide the development team in the implementation of the solution.
 * Provide feedback to implement integrations with payment gateways and headless content management systems
 * Oversee the design, implementation, and maintenance of CI/CD pipelines using Cloud Build and Terraform for infrastructure management and deployments
 * Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, UI/UX designers, and QA engineers to ensure the successful delivery of the project
 * Identify best practices to conduct thorough code reviews and ensure adherence to coding standards
   
   

What You Have

As a software architect, we prefer that you have:


 * Strong experience in frameworks such as Ruby on Rails, Angular, Go, and also with Google Cloud Platform, microservices architecture
 * Knowledge of Pub/Sub, Cloud SQL (PostgreSQL), Google Cloud Build, Terraform, and IaaC
 * Familiarity with Google Cloud Run, Google Kubernetes Engine, Docker, Stripe, Contentful, REST, GraphQL, and CI/CD
 * Excellent communication, collaboration skills and the ability to lead a team
 * Passion for building scalable and efficient solutions to tackle environmental issues
   
   

What We Offer

We care about our employees and we offer you:


 * Occupational Healthcare in Riyadh and Thailand
 * Competitive salary as mentioned above
 * Opportunities for growth and enrichment through Grow with Oivan, our internal learning and development departments
 * Team building activities, movie nights, events
 * An international workforce to learn from and grow with
 * Opportunities for travel and working abroad
 * Generous remote work opportunities
   
   

If you are a proactive and enthusiastic individual with a passion for designing and implementing scalable microservices architecture, and are excited about working on real estate projects, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. We offer competitive compensation and benefits packages, as well as opportunities for growth and career development.

Oivan as an Equal Opportunity Employer

At Oivan, we appreciate different lifestyles and cultural backgrounds. We welcome diversity as a strength. We consider all applications equally regardless of race, colour, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or gender identity. We strongly encourage individuals from groups traditionally underrepresented in tech to apply. On our equitable compensation model, we routinely analyse and close out pay disparities when we find them, including an annual compensation review.

We will prioritise applications in the following order: Finland and then any of our other locations.

(GDPR statement)

By submitting your application and CV, you give us consent to handle and store your personal information in our information systems according to GDPR compliancy and full confidentiality.
title: Software Architect (Ruby on Rails, relocation to Riyadh provided)
Cloud Computing: Google Cloud Run, Cloud SQL, RDS, Google Cloud Platform, Terraform, Docker, Pub/Sub, Kubernetes

description:
Zalando fulfills more than 200 million orders every year and the volumes are increasing. Whenever a customer experiences our shop the technology is at the scene and behind the scenes - software makes our systems work. Emerging Propositions is a growing multi-disciplinary group of engineers, data scientists, business developers, product designers, and product managers in Helsinki and Berlin, working to inspire each individual customer with meaningful fashion moments beyond transactions in a very personalized way.

As a (Senior) Backend Engineer in Emerging Propositions, you will get to innovate, design, build, optimize and automate software on a massive scale leveraging microservices, Kotlin, Java, AWS, Kubernetes. This role provides a unique opportunity to collaborate in a multidisciplinary team of mobile, web, and backend engineers and shape the next chapter in Zalando customer experience and we will support you to grow and work with exciting modern technologies.

INCLUSIVE BY DESIGN

At Zalando, our vision is to be inclusive by design. And this vision starts with our hiring - we do not discriminate on the basis of gender identity, sexual orientation, personal expression, ethnicity, religious belief, or disability status. You are welcome to leave out your picture, age, or marital status from your application. We only assess candidates on their qualifications and merit.

We want to provide you with a great candidate experience. Feel free to inform us of any accommodations you may need, so we can best support you throughout the hiring process.

do.BETTER - our diversity & inclusion strategy https //corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/dobetter-our-diversity-and-inclusion-strategy

Our employee resource groups https //corporate.zalando.com/en/our-impact/our-employee-resource-groups


WHAT WE‚ÄôD LOVE YOU TO DO (AND LOVE DOING)


Emerging Propositions teams are responsible for enabling and evolving product offerings in Beauty, Designer and Pre-owned categories. We solve customer problems related to unique customer experiences and assortment properties like high number of makeup shades, distinct presentation of luxury brands.



 * Innovate, design, build and operate systems contributing to unique customer experiences used by Zalando customers in massive scale
 * Together with your multidisciplinary team, you will contribute to the codebases as well as operate large-scale applications leveraging Cloud Platforms
 * You contribute to the full development cycle from solution planning and design to development, deployment, operations and monitorin
 * Take an active role in understanding business requirements and translating them into technological solutions. Collaborate closely with Product Management (and other roles) to refine the functional requirements and build test cases to be verified during development and feature release
 * Participate in code reviews and use feedback as an opportunity for growth Proactively help in the growth of juniors and peers in your team and beyond
 * You keep learning and share your knowledge of state-of-the-art technologies that will help us innovate faster
   
   
   
   

WE‚ÄôD LOVE TO MEET YOU IF




 * Solid command of Java, Kotlin, SQL and knowledge of software patterns and paradigms like continuous integration, test automation, deployment pipelines, and willingness to use the ones along with the team
 * Track record in specifying, planning and developing microservices and data pipelines, GraphQL , REST API (OpenAPI) , Cloud Platforms (AWS, Kubernetes)
 * Experience in Scala and interest in Web frontend technologies (React, Vue, Micro Frontend Architecture) is plus
 * High level knowledge, interest or experience in data engineering and familiarity with S3, PostgreSQL, DAGs, data pipelines, Superset, Databricks, Airflow is plus
 * Positive energy and no-job-is-beneath-you attitude and you‚Äôre a team player with an attitude of accountability, knowledge-sharing and self direction
   
   
   

If you think you have what it takes, we encourage you to apply even if you don't meet every single requirement. You may just be the right candidate for this or other roles.

OUR OFFER



 * Centrally located and accessible office in Kamppi, Helsinki city center, with diverse working and entertainment spaces and healthy snacks and drinks available.
 * Hybrid work model of up to 60% remote work and flexible working times.
 * 40% Zalando shopping discount for employees, employee share shop, bike benefit, and Edenred benefits for lunch, sports and culture, commuting and massage.
 * Extensive occupational health care and child care benefits.
 * Additional holidays and volunteering time off.
 * Supportive and active international community of colleagues for onboarding, mentoring, continued learning and for having fun through diverse offering of meetups and events, knowledge guilds and Employee Resource Groups with open source commitment.
 * Relocation assistance for internationals.
   
   
   

Learn all about Zalando and our values here https //jobs.zalando.com/en/?gh_src=22377bdd1us . For more information about our office and teams in Helsinki, please visit https //jobs.zalando.com/en/where-we-work/helsinki

Please note that all applications must be completed using the online form - we do not accept applications via email.

description:
Job Title: Senior Software Engineer

Location: Hybrid within Finland - Candidates must be able to travel to Helsinki regularly when required

Salary: up to 6,800‚Ç¨ / month

English Speaking

About The Role

Our client is seeking a skilled and motivated Senior Software Engineer to join their dynamic team. As part of the team, you'll be involved in designing, developing, and operating platforms that protect billions of home user devices from cyber threats. The team operates across multiple European locations, and leverages cloud-native solutions (AWS) and cutting-edge technologies.

Team Structure


 * Lead Engineer
 * 4 Mid/Senior Engineers
   
   

Key Responsibilities


 * Collaborate with the team to enhance operational quality and efficiency.
 * Design, operate, and drive multi-region AWS deployment strategies.
 * Participate in developing large-volume, low-latency services.
 * Contribute to the development of large-scale data processing services.
 * Ensure secure design, development, and operation of services across the company.
   
   

Operational Focus

This role is heavily focused on maintaining the stability and uptime of their services and the underlying infrastructure. The primary goal is to keep everything online, with no new product development involved. The ideal candidate will rotate across various products and services, making this role ideal for those with a consulting background and a strong operational mindset.

What We're Looking For


 * Ops Mentality: Strong experience in service development, with a focus on monitoring, telemetry, automated alerts, and self-recovery.
 * AWS Expertise: Proven experience in AWS infrastructure management using Terraform or similar IaC practices, with a strong understanding of cost management.
 * Deployment Experience: Hands-on experience with Fargate/Lambda.
 * Agile Development: Strong experience with Agile methodologies.
 * Python Proficiency: 5 years +
 * Docker: Professional experience with Docker.
 * Communication Skills: Strong ability to collaborate and communicate effectively in both real and remote meetings.
 * Proactive Attitude: A hands-on and can-do approach, ready to tackle challenges head-on.
   
   

Preferred Skills


 * Documentation and technical writing.
 * Secure SDLC practices.
 * Service disaster recovery practices.
 * Experience within the security industry.
   
   

Work Environment

This position is initially hybrid, with the flexibility to transition to full remote work after a ramp-up period. Physical presence will be required primarily during the initial onboarding phase and to participate in sprint planning and review sessions.

PLEASE NOTE: APPLICANTS FROM OUTSIDE OF FINLAND WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED FOR THIS ROLE.

description:
At EY, you‚Äôll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we‚Äôre counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

You will be part of EY‚Äôs EMEIA-based Digital Health Excellence Center (DHEC). Our mission is to improve health outcomes and patient experiences. As the DHEC, we bring our expert knowledge and delivery power to industry-leading healthcare providers in collaboration with the local firms.

The opportunity

As a software architect, you will work alongside a team of international experts in technology, business and the healthcare industry. Software development is one of the core strengths of the DHEC and pivotal in delivering digital health tools for our clients. With you we want to further strengthen our technical expertise.

Your Key Responsibilities

As a software architect, you are responsible for the oversight and guidance of the development team to ensure the architectural vision is maintained. Additionally, you will work together with near- and off-shore technical teams, vendors and external partners to ensure our tailored software solutions for our healthcare clients are compliant with health regulations and standards. In your role, you will collaborate with clinical teams, administrators, and other healthcare professionals to prioritize and address health-specific software requirements.

As technical expert, you evaluate and select software development technologies, tools and platforms. You also identify software requirements and design architectural blueprints for development team to follow. Additionally, you communicate requirements with other stakeholders like project managers, scrum masters, product owners, business analysts, developers and infrastructure or security architects, as well as provide training and support in business development.

What you can contribute ‚Äì skills fand attributes or shaping the future


 * Strong written and verbal communication, presentation, client service and technical writing skills for both technical and business audiences.
 * Proficiency in the local language of your country of residence is required.
 * Fluency in English and German (written and verbal) is a pre-requisite. Knowledge of additional languages (Italian/Portuguese) will be appreciated.
 * Strong analytical, problem solving and critical thinking skills.
 * Ability to work under tight timelines for multiple project deliveries in parallel.
 * Ability/flexibility to travel.
   
   

To qualify for the role you must have


 * Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, (Software) Engineering or other related field with strong IT focus. Master's or further certification are advantageous.
 * Minimum of 5 years of working experience, preferably 2 years in a healthcare context and with particular focus on designing and implementing custom developed applications on native mobile platforms (Android/iOS). Experience with hybrid solutions or web is a plus.
 * Deep understanding of mobile application development, the frameworks and the technical characteristics of the mobile operating systems Android and iOS.
 * Deep understanding of software architectures on all layers ‚Äì network, infrastructure, security, persistence, application and frontend in order to be able to effectively communicate with stakeholders.
 * Proven experience in writing technical concepts, database design and data modeling.
 * Experience with CI/CD tech stacks, e.g. Azure DevOps, Jenkins, Puppet, Ansible, Terraform.
 * Experience in designing architectures in healthcare system landscapes and ensuring interoperability between healthcare-specific data formats, e.g. HL7/FHIR, OMOP, xDT, openEHR.
 * Good knowledge of the German healthcare system landscapes and reference architectures at hospitals, service providers, and/or health insurance companies, e.g., TI, HIS, LIMS.
   
   

Ideally, you‚Äôll also have


 * A reliable network in the healthcare industry and a consulting track record.
 * A good overview of industry technology trends and emerging technologies, understand how they apply to our healthcare clients and can drive their adoption into our projects.
 * Good knowledge of (agile) project management standards, processes, procedures and guidelines as well as the related frameworks, e.g. Scrum or SAFe.
 * Be able to read and develop code in known programming languages, e.g. Java, C++, C#, Python, PHP.
   
   

What We Look For

We are looking for an experienced Software Architect with strong technical skills and a proven track record working in a healthcare context.

What We Offer

As part of this role, you'll work in a highly integrated, global team with the opportunity and tools to grow, develop and drive your career forward. Here, you can combine global opportunity with flexible working. The EY benefits package goes above and beyond too, focusing on your physical, emotional, financial and social well-being. Your recruiter can talk to you about the benefits available in your country. Here‚Äôs a snapshot of what we offer:


 * Continuous learning: You‚Äôll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next.
 * Success as defined by you: We‚Äôll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way.
 * Transformative leadership: We‚Äôll give you the insights, coaching and confidence to be the leader the world needs.
 * Diverse and inclusive culture: You‚Äôll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs.
   
   

Please apply to this role only through the ‚ÄòApply‚Äô link (not through the local office). Your application will then be routed to the appropriate recruiting team.

The exceptional EY experience. It‚Äôs yours to build.

EY | Building a better working world

EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.

Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.

Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

description:
Are you interested in machine learning applied to material modelling problems and looking for a key position in the field? Would you like to develop innovative technology with superb colleagues who are top experts in their field? Do you want to build an excellent science career and work at the interface of academy and industry? Are you enthusiastic about working with fascinating projects in state-of-the-art research facilities? VTT might be just the place for you. If you are an international talent searching for a new opportunity, read more about the benefits of living in Finland and VTT‚Äôs support for relocation here!




VTT is one of the leading applied research organisations in Europe. What unites us are curiosity, a passion for learning and a purpose: to solve the biggest challenges of our time and turn them into sustainable growth and well-being. Our cross-disciplinary community of over 2300 brilliant minds from almost 60 different nationalities is focused on creating impact through science-based innovation. Get to know us further by exploring VTT's tech & infra.




---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------




We are now looking for a Principal Scientist to join our ProperTune Integration team!




VTT ProperTune¬Æ is a unique methodology to solve complex material problems and to invent totally new materials with unprecedented properties. Integrated Computational Materials Engineering (ICME) approach is used to turn traditional material research into inverse design of new materials with designed properties. In recent years machine learning methods, such as surrogate modelling, physics informed neural networks and generative methods have become an integrated part of both ICME concept and larger Materials Acceleration Platform (MAP) concept developed at VTT.




In this key position, you will have an essential role in leading the research of applying machine learning algorithms to material modelling problems. You will be working in close collaboration with our machine learning experts and material scientists in different fields to plan, prepare and lead a strong joint project portfolio. Material application areas range from metals to battery materials, and from biopolymers to semiconductor materials.




In addition to applying machine learning for Materials, our team ProperTune Integration works also on High Performance Computing utilizing the fastest supercomputer in Europe, the LUMI, and VTT‚Äôs own quantum computers. Our overall objective is to accelerate new material development with data driven and computationally fast solutions and that way to support the development of new materials needed in green transition, finding substitutions because of resource scarcity, and enabling development of new material applications.




Read more about our VTT ProperTune¬Æ concept: https://www.vttresearch.com/en/ourservices/computational-material-design-vtt-propertune







Your responsibilities as a Principal Scientist:




 * Conducting world-class research in applying ML methods to material modelling problems and having significant impact on scientific, societal and/or business level
 * Together with our team and several collaborating teams at VTT to develop strong project portfolio to meet our strategic targets
 * To have an active leading role in project planning and preparation, including active communication with customers and partners and writing research plans/project proposals for national and EU funding instruments
 * You will work in projects typically in a leading role steering our own work, mentoring younger researchers and being responsible for partner communications and joint project coordination
 * As a project manager or coordinator, ensure that defined tasks are performed on time and results are delivered and reported with high quality, and further you take care that generated results and knowhow supports our scientific and business capability development
 * Support our team members pursuing their PhD thesis







Who we are looking for:




 * Experienced researcher with background in machine learning and familiar with materials and their modelling, while HPC and quantum-ML knowhow being a slight plus
 * You have gained your doctoral degree in computer science, data science or mathematics, or a closely related field already a while ago (min 8 years ago).
 * You have extensive experience in project preparations by utilizing different funding sources such as Horizon Europe.
 * As an experienced researcher, you have established networks both in academia and industry and like to widen those nationally and globally.
 * You have solid track record of international publications and innovations
 * You have excellent communication skills in English, both written and spoken.
 * Proficiency in professional software development is a plus







As a person, we hope that you are:




 * Innovative, an outside-the-box thinker with the ability to learn new things continuously and to create a vision of longer-term research needs.
 * You enjoy challenges and have a strong passion for work.
 * We appreciate the ability to tolerate pressure and maintain good work-life balance, as well as the willingness to collaborate with experts and partners across different fields.
 * You are eager to work with new topics and methods, even out of your comfort zone to achieve the set ambitious goals.







With VTT, you‚Äôll enjoy:




Science with an impact. At VTT, we seek to solve large societal challenges and drive a sustainable future through applied research and innovation. With us, you‚Äôll get to work on research projects that make a concrete, positive impact in the world. Read more about our strategy, the path of exponential hope, and our organisational culture as the builder of the world's most meaningful place to work.




Next step in your career. At VTT, excellence in research is a strategic priority. We offer long-term positions and stable career paths in top-level research. People tend to stay with us over 10 years since there are always new roles and responsibilities to grow into. Collaborating in a cross-disciplinary community with superb colleagues is a source of learning, inspiration, and fun. At VTT, you‚Äôll enjoy flexibility and independence in your work, with a blend of academic research and engaging customer projects for an exciting career path.




Open culture of innovation. We have 80 years of experience in science-based innovation, a strong international reputation, and global networks. We work truly across disciplines, and house all the cutting-edge sciences from quantum computing to synthetic biology under one roof. At VTT, you‚Äôll join a community of over 2200 multidisciplinary experts who foster a culture of trust, openness and sharing knowledge. Collaborating with amazing colleagues is a source of learning, inspiration, and fun.




Nordic work-life balance. Working in Finland, the happiest country in the world, enables a great quality of life. At VTT, we make our people‚Äôs well-being a strategic priority. On top of 6 weeks of paid holidays annually (after one year of work), our benefits include extended occupational healthcare, and a range of well-being services, such as exercise and culture benefits and hobby clubs. Read more about the benefits of living in Finland and VTT‚Äôs support for relocation.




Apply now and join our community of brilliant minds!




Please send your CV and application as soon as possible but at the latest by 15th October 2024. We will process applications as they come in, and fill in the position as soon as we find the right candidate. A security clearance procedure may be conducted during the recruitment process.




Interested and want to hear more?




For further information, you're always welcome to reach out to our recruitment partners Tech Talent Advisor Roosa Holkko, roosa@findersseekers.io or Tech Talent Advisor Maria Vuorinen, maria@findersseekers.io.




We look forward to hearing from you!




Apply between 09 September 2024 and 15th October 2024 23:59 (Europe/Helsinki)




Employment type: Full-time, Permanent




Location: Vuorimiehentie 2, Espoo or Visiokatu 4, Tampere




VTT is a visionary research, development and innovation partner. We drive sustainable growth and tackle the biggest global challenges of our time and turn them into growth opportunities. We go beyond the obvious to help society and companies to grow through technological innovations. We have 80 years of experience in top-level research and science-based results. VTT is at the sweet spot where innovation and business come together.




VTT ‚Äì beyond the obvious.
title: Principal Scientist, Machine Learning for Materials

description:
The company

Doublepoint creates gesture recognition software for smartwatches. Our technologies are being used to control AR/VR, IoT, wearables, automotive, AI assistants, TVs, and much more. Our smartwatch algorithms detect subtle hand gestures and need to be accurate, responsive, low power, and generalizable across populations. We're a small team of 15 people based mostly in Helsinki, with 6m euro in funding from VCs and angels, and our technology is being used by over 65k people today.

The Role

We are seeking a Principal Machine Learning Engineer to spearhead our ML team. This role consists of a blend of technical leadership and hands-on coding. It requires deep and up-to-date knowledge of machine learning techniques, especially in the realm of live sensor stream-based classification. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience deploying machine learning models into real products.

Key Responsibilities


 * Performance Tracking: Set standards for how performance metrics are calculated and communicated to the team and customers
 * Signal Processing: Devise and implement ways of determining what information can be gathered from a signal.
 * Model Development: Create and test various signal processing logic, algorithms, and neural networks to detect multiple different gestures.
 * Model Improvement: Make well-informed improvements to model performance.
 * Model Deployment: Deploy models securely, obfuscating our models.
 * Sensor Parameter Definition: Define the sensor parameters used for optimal gesture recognition.
 * Model Training: Improve model training speeds and memory efficiency.
 * Team Leadership: Define model development roadmaps.
   
   

Shared Activities with Other Teams


 * Data Acquisition: Devising data acquisition games and required hardware.
 * Metrics Development: Devising model performance metrics with our interaction team, customers, and users.
 * Hardware Specifications: Defining data acquisition, and testing hardware specifications.
   
   

Requirements


 * Experience: Proven experience in developing and deploying ML models to end consumers.
 * Technical Skills: Strong understanding of signal processing, time series classification, and machine learning.
 * Leadership: Set a technical direction for a team, hold the team accountable to high quality and technical standards. Contribute to hiring decisions.
 * Communication: Excellent communication skills, with the ability to give technical and team member feedback.
   
   

Personal Qualities


 * Ambition: Desire to be part of a world-class team.
 * Domain Interest: Genuine interest in human computer interaction.
 * Excellence: Almost an unhealthy obsession with the quality of the things we build.
 * User Centricity: Actively caring and ensuring that things we make feel great by others, not just by ourselves.
 * Agency: Going beyond one‚Äôs own prescribed domain to ensure that things get done and taking responsibility for it.
   
   

Keywords

Signal Processing, Algorithm Developer, Sensors, Electrical and Electronics Engineer, Machine Learning
title: Principal Machine Learning Engineer

description:
Are you a driven data scientist ready to jump into new challenges with opportunities to grow and develop? Do you thrive on refining insights from data and enabling marketing teams in making the right decisions? Look no further. We are seeking a Senior Marketing Data Scientist to join our international team of marketing professionals working in our offices in Finland, the UK, and North America, and remotely from all over the world. With us, you will get to drive growth for our global and Finnish client base. We are highly supportive of remote work, but your role would involve visiting our offices in Turku or Helsinki, Finland, when needed.

Luxid is a forward-thinking tech & digital marketing agency committed to our values: driven, trailblazing, resourceful, and sincere. We Luxidians are a team of creative thinkers, strategists, data analysts, developers, technologist, writers, designers, filmmakers, and virtual world builders. With over 30 years of experience in delivering marketing and commerce solutions, we help our clients drive sales with seamless customer journeys and flawless website operations.

As a Senior Marketing Data Scientist, you will play a pivotal role in guiding multinational B2C and B2B clients through marketing analytics and supporting their data-driven culture with business intelligence (BI) development. You will handle challenging data projects with the support of our experienced team. Your strong presentation, storytelling and consulting skills are crucial for your success.

Key responsibilities:


 * Marketing data analytics
    * Supporting digital marketing operations through applied marketing analytics & reporting encompassing multi-channel marketing data
    * Ready to utilise tools like Similarweb, web analytics platforms (i.e. Google tools) and public data & statistics repositories
    * Applying Python or optionally R to enable advanced marketing analytics applications (clustering algorithms for segmentation, customer lifetime value estimation)
    * Developing and optimising SQL queries, handling large amounts of data to create target group segments

 * BI development
    * Developing user-friendly, storytelling reports & dashboards using modern BI solutions (Power BI, Tableu & Looker Studio)
    * Operating common data pipeline tools and databases to support good data. Storage solutions: GCP BigQuery, Azure, AWS. Integration platforms: Dataddo, Supermetrics.

 * Collaboration
    * Working in digital marketing teams, using collaboration tools and methods: JIRA, Scrum or other agile working methods
    * Participating in team weeklies to build team knowledge, mentoring junior colleagues
      

Qualifications:


 * Minimum 5 years experience working in digital marketing
 * Minimum 3 years experience working with data analytics and relevant technologies
 * Good communication skills and an uplifting can-do attitude to fit the team spirit
 * Skills:
    * Proficiency with BI tools (Power BI)
    * Experience with scripting/coding for analytics (Python or optionally R+)
    * Familiarity with digital analytics tools (Google Analytics, Semrush/Similarweb)
    * Familiarity with data integration tools and databases (SQL, Storage solutions: GCP, Azure, AWS. Integration platforms: Dataddo, Supermetrics.)
      

What we offer you:


 * Great team of highly skilled, supportive, and experienced professionals
 * International, English-speaking, diverse, and inclusive equal opportunity workplace
 * Possibility to grow as a professional with a wide range of learning opportunities
 * Extensive occupational healthcare plan
 * Culture, sport, and wellness benefits
 * Flexible remote working opportunities all around the world but also offices in Helsinki, Turku, and London. In this position, you need to be able to visit our Turku or Helsinki office when necessary.
 * Monthly pay starting from 4 500 ‚Ç¨/month depending on your experience and skills.
   
   

Want to know more about what it takes to be a Luxidian? Our values create a simple framework for everything we do. They are also our guiding principles when we are looking for new members to our team. Find out more in our blog: Why living our values is so important for all of us at Luxid (luxidgroup.com)

Interested? Apply now and join our team of Luxidians.

Please submit your application by 30.9.2024 at the latest ‚Äì the position will be filled as soon as we find the right candidate.
title: Senior Marketing Data Scientist

description:
Do you get excited when hearing about trademarks and brand protection news? YES?! So do we! At Corsearch, there‚Äôs no pushing trademark solutions and brand protection from our thoughts. We‚Äôre thinking about coined trademarks in the car, a detailed design search over lunch, counterfeits while sitting with the in-laws, and anti-piracy while working out

From IP clearance to Brand Protection, Corsearch provides a comprehensive program that enables businesses to secure brand value and thrive commercially.







We are a mission-led company, driven by a passion for making the world better and safer for our brand customers and their consumers. It‚Äôs what we do. And people come to Corsearch to be challenged, developed, supported, and valued üëç













‚úÖThe Role

Corsearch is expanding its AI team and is looking for a Principal Data Scientist to take the lead on R&D and customer innovation in our Trademark services. This role will lead a team of two Data Scientists / Machine Learning engineers, across a variety of projects and working closely with peers in the central and Brand Protection teams. The Principal Data Scientist will be the accountable owner for AI and Data Science solutions for Trademark Solutions, working closely with the VP of Engineering and the VP of Innovation who are also based in the Helsinki office, and the VP of Product who is based remotely.







Learn more about our Data Science org, and wider business here







‚úÖResponsibilities And Duties




Strategic Leadership

 * Define and drive the data science strategy for Trademark Solutions, aligned with business goals and objectives.
 * Identify opportunities for leveraging data to drive business growth and innovation.

Project Management

 * Lead data science projects from ideation through to implementation and evaluation.
 * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure successful project delivery.

Advanced Analytics and Modelling

 * Develop and deploy sophisticated machine learning models and algorithms to solve business problems.
 * Conduct exploratory data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
 * Work closely with subject matter experts to validate results and share knowledge about the used methodology

Team Leadership and Mentorship

 * Lead a team of 3-4 data scientists and actively manage R&D projects on the roadmap
 * Mentor and guide junior data scientists, fostering a culture of continuous learning and development.
 * Provide technical leadership and support to the data science team.

Stakeholder Engagement

 * Communicate complex data findings to non-technical stakeholders through compelling visualisations and presentations.
 * Collaborate with senior leadership to align data initiatives with business strategy.
 * Proactively engage with stakeholders in Product and Operations teams to ensure successful project delivery.

Research and Innovation

 * Stay current with the latest advancements in data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence.
 * Experiment with new tools, technologies, and methodologies to continually enhance data science capabilities.
 * Try different approaches to achieve optimal performance and accuracy.
 * Follow agile practices and facilitate team events, like knowledge sharing, code review and brainstorming sessions.

Performance Monitoring, Continuous Improvement and Reporting

 * Develop metrics and KPIs to measure the effectiveness of data science initiatives.
 * Maintain training and testing data, monitor performance and consistency of models in production and ensure models are appropriately maintained.
 * Regularly report on project progress, outcomes, and insights to stakeholders.













‚úÖEssential

 * PhD or MSc degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Artificial Intelligence or related field
 * Extensive experience in researching/building data science applications, with proven experience in a leadership role.

Technical Skills

 * Hands-on development experience with LLMs, deep learning NLP models, Transformer based models, fine-tuning, transfer learning
 * Extensive understanding of classical NLP models, search algorithms, structures and indices
 * GPU-backed modelling/inference
 * Proficient programming skills in a high-level DS languages (python, R)
 * Cloud architectures (AWS, GCP, Kaggle, etc.)
 * Relational databases, noSQL, in-memory database technologies, graph processing (Elasticsearch, MongoDB, Redis)
 * Broader knowledge of large dataset processing pipelines and distributed computing architectures (Apache Beam/Airflow, Spark/Hadoop architectures)
 * Exceptional problem-solving skills and the ability to work with complex datasets.
 * Proven ability to lead and inspire a team, manage multiple projects, and drive strategic initiatives.
 * Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to convey technical information to non-technical audiences.










‚úÖBeneficial Skills & Experience:

 * AWS hosting & managed services
 * Database technologies such as Clickhouse and Scylla
 * Elasticsearch or Solr
 * Infrastructure automation, such as Terraform
 * Agile development practices and continuous improvement










‚úÖ What can we offer you?

 * Lunch benefit (Corsearch offers a reimbursement of 25% of the costs beared by the employees for their lunch ‚Äì up to a max of EUR 660 per year. Part-time employees are entitled to lunch benefit pro-rata to the worked days.)
 * Sport/culture benefit (Corsearch provides all employees a sports/culture benefit. The amount of sports/culture benefit is EUR 250 per year to each employee and it is tax-exempt. The benefit is loaded to your Edenred card quarterly. Part-time employees or employees working only part of the calendar year are entitled to sports/culture benefit pro rata to the worked days.)
 * Holiday bonus (50% of holiday pay)
 * Pension scheme - Ilmarinen
 * Statutory accident insurance - Localtapiola covers all the below insurances for all employees.
 * statutory accident insurance for work and leisure for all employees (The statutory accident insurance covers the following: accidents at work, at the workplace, on business trips and work-related illnesses)
 * Group life insurance
 * Occupational Health care - Terveystalo
 * Annual holidays: 30 days
 * Birthday off
 * Flex leave: If you work more than 37.5 hours per week you can use the extra working hours as paid leave.




Corsearch is an equal opportunity and inclusive employer and does not tolerate discrimination of any kind. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace where all employees feel valued, respected, and supported. We welcome applications from all individuals regardless of race, nationality, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, disability, or any other protected characteristic. Together, we are working proactively to build a workplace where everyone can belong and be at their best selves. Together, we make an Impact.

Trusted by over 5,000 customers worldwide, Corsearch delivers AI-powered data, deep analytics, and professional services that support brands to market their assets, drive growth, and optimise brand presence against infringement.

Corsearch enables brand owners to discover, monitor and control the use and misuse of their brands and associated products and services online and is the industry market leader.

Corsearch does this in an increasingly complex global digital environment, with online brand protection solutions that cover everything from anti-counterfeiting to anti-piracy.

description:
Are you passionate about smart grids, power system control and automation, and cutting-edge artificial intelligence techniques? Are you eager to take the next step in your career by working on groundbreaking projects that bridge the gap between academia and industry? If you're excited about contributing to innovative research in state-of-the-art facilities and shaping the future of energy systems, VTT could be the perfect place for you.

VTT is one of the leading applied research organisations in Europe. What unites us are curiosity, a passion for learning, and a purpose: to solve the biggest challenges of our time and turn them into sustainable growth and well-being. Our cross-disciplinary community of over 2000 brilliant minds focuses on creating impact through science-based innovation. In recent years, we have created ground-breaking innovations such as the world's fastest and most accurate radiation detector, a cancer-sniffing sensor device for smartphones, and a headphone set entirely made of microbial materials. Get to know us further by exploring VTT's tech & infra .

We are now looking for a Research Scientist or Senior Scientist to join our Smart Grids team!

As a Research or Senior Scientist, your key goals are to lead groundbreaking research and innovation in smart grids, harnessing your deep expertise in power systems and cutting-edge technologies. With us, you will primarily focus on conducting advanced research, developing sophisticated experimental methodologies, and contributing to the ongoing innovation within our IntelligentEnergy laboratory. Depending on your experience and skills, you might also take on a leadership role, conducting research and driving project acquisition, leading large-scale research projects, and shaping the future direction of our smart grid research efforts.

You will take responsibility for developing sophisticated experimental research, focusing on real-time simulations, Hardware-in-the-Loop (HIL) testing, and SCADA. Your responsibilities will extend to research or leading significant research projects, with a special emphasis on cybersecurity and AI applications, including data analytics and machine learning to enhance power system flexibility, reliability, and resilience. Through your visionary approach and collaborative spirit, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of energy systems and fostering an environment of excellence and innovation within the team and the broader scientific community.

The Smart Grids team is at the forefront of crafting innovative solutions for the future low-carbon energy system in which the electrical grid plays a central role. With a deep understanding of the power systems' current operations within the broader energy system, our team is expert in anticipating and adapting to its future transformations. A confluence of global developments drives these changes: a shifting energy mix, the accelerated electrification of transport and industry, the rise of cutting-edge digital technologies, and the growing demand for a more reliable and flexible electricity supply. Our team's expertise uniquely positions us to navigate these complexities, ensuring that our solutions meet today's needs and pave the way for a sustainable and resilient energy future.

As a Research or Senior Scientist, you will:


 * Foster advanced research in Smart Grid technologies. Your work will involve theoretical research and practical laboratory experimentation, particularly in SCADA systems, cybersecurity and AI applications, including data analytics and machine learning, real-time simulations, and HIL testing.
 * Develop experimental research methodologies. Design and implement novel experimental approaches in the IntelligentEnergy laboratory. This includes developing models, HIL methods, SCADA integration, tools, and advanced data analysis platforms to support the research infrastructure.
 * Develop research infrastructure. Enhancing the research infrastructure, ensuring it remains at the forefront of technological advancements and is capable of supporting complex experimental setups, including integrating and testing SCADA systems within the laboratory environment.
   
   
   

Based on your experience and skills, you might also:


 * Manage research projects. Identify opportunities and manage research projects, particularly those focusing on microgrids, data analytics, ML, and AI applications.
 * Mentorship and team leadership. Provide mentorship and guidance to scientists early in their careers, promoting a culture of learning and innovation. Your leadership will help build a cohesive, collaborative team.
 * Advance collaborative partnerships. Initiate and cultivate partnerships with academia, industry, and governmental agencies.
 * Contribute to scientific knowledge and policy development. Actively engage in the dissemination of research findings through publications, conferences, and workshops. Additionally, contribute to developing policies and standards related to smart grids and renewable energy systems, ensuring that your research has a lasting impact on the scientific community and society.
   
   
   

Your profile and experience:


 * You demonstrate expertise in power systems, especially advanced power system control. Your experience extends to power system management, automation and mastery of communication protocols.
 * You hold a Doctor of Science (Tech) degree in Electrical Engineering or Master of Science (Tech) degree, and you have gained a holistic understanding of power system development and operation through your work experience.
 * Your expertise in data analytics, ML and AI techniques makes you valuable to the team. You are skilled in programming languages such as Python, MATLAB, Julia, and/or Java.
 * You are highly skilled in utilizing and integrating various power system simulation tools, including RT-Lab, RSCAD, Simulink, PSCAD, PowerFactory, and PSS/E.
 * You speak English fluently. Other languages, especially Finnish, are considered an asset.
 * You work well in a multicultural environment with other researchers and engineers.
   
   
   

The following things are considered as advantages:


 * You have a proven track record in leading research initiatives, some of which are related to the integration of distributed and renewable energy resources, improving power system flexibility, reliability, and resilience, and the development of cutting-edge electricity distribution systems and power quality data analytics, with a strong emphasis on AI applications and cybersecurity.
 * Your experience includes leading roles in modern testing environments, where you have designed advanced testing setups and overseen comprehensive experiments with various types of HIL. Your background in laboratory facility development and strategic planning is essential.
   
   
   

Your unique skills and experience may be just what we need, so please consider applying even if you do not meet every requirement listed!

As a person, we hope that you are:


 * Good team worker and have a positive attitude towards complex research challenges.
 * Fast learner and curious person, excited about learning and working with different projects on integrating energy resources in future power systems.
 * Safety-minded person who is comfortable working in a low-voltage electrical laboratory environment.
 * Excited about producing high-level research that leads to relevant publications; willing to perform vital networking with international academic partners.
   
   
   

What we offer you:


 * Visionary work in technology.‚ÄØWe offer positions at the cutting-edge of technology and engineering from next-generation microelectronics and quantum technology to automation and robotics, energy systems and more. Our research agenda is dedicated to creating sustainable growth by solving systemic and technological challenges, so your work will go towards creating real, positive impact. Read more about our strategy ‚Äì‚ÄØ the path of exponential hope .
 * Fascinating projects, excellent research environment.‚ÄØOur researchers get to work on a combination of cutting-edge academic research and applied customer projects, both locally and internationally. At VTT, you‚Äôll have state-of-the-art research facilities at your disposal, such as VTT FutureHub , the headquarters of VTT.
 * Great career opportunities, superb colleagues.‚ÄØAt VTT, excellence in research is a strategic priority. We offer long-term positions and stable career paths in top-level research. People tend to stay with us for over 10 years since there are always new roles and responsibilities to grow into. Collaborating in a cross-disciplinary community with superb colleagues is a source of learning, inspiration, and fun. Read more about our organisational culture as the builder of the world's most meaningful place to work.
 * Support for your well-being. Our people are our main asset, so we take good care of them. We aim to nurture great team spirit and leadership and offer versatile well-being services to enable a good work-life balance. On top of annual 6 weeks of paid holidays (after one year of work), we offer exercise and culture benefits, hobby clubs, and voluntary well-being services such as meditation programmes and trainings on cognitive ergonomics.
   
   
   

Apply now and join our community of brilliant minds!

Please send your CV and application with your salary request via our recruitment system as soon as possible but at the latest by 18 September 2024. We will process applications as they come in and fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate since we hope that the person can start as soon as possible. A security clearance procedure may be conducted during the recruitment process.

Interested and want to know more?

For further information, please contact Research Team Leader Katja Sirvi√∂, e-mail: katja.sirvio@vtt.fi , or tel. +358503140749 on 4 September at 15‚Äì16 or 16 September at 13‚Äì14 (Finnish time, UCT+3).

We look forward to hearing from you!

VTT

VTT is a visionary research, development and innovation partner. We drive sustainable growth and tackle the biggest global challenges of our time and turn them into growth opportunities. We go beyond the obvious to help the society and companies to grow through technological innovations. We have 80 years of experience of top-level research and science-based results. VTT is at the sweet spot where innovation and business come together.

VTT ‚Äì beyond the obvious.

description:

Hybrid within Finland

English Speaking




About the Role:

Are you an experienced software engineer looking to take your career to the next level? description:
CGI Innovation Center of Excellence in Finland develops new services and solutions to our customers in Finland and globally. Our key services consist of Cloud and Data Analytics Solutions, Automation, Design, Enterprise Data Management and AI solutions. We are now facing a strong demand for growth and are now looking for experienced AI Consultants to join our strong team at Advanced Analytics Solutions -unit.




Job Description

Your job, whether you identify yourself as a Data Scientist, ML Engineer/Architect, or a GenAI Developer, is to transform our customers business problems into data problems and solve them with the help of technology creating sustainable business value.




Your daily life will be varied, involving activities such as technical sales efforts, algorithm development, ML pipeline optimization, or fine-tuning GenAI models. However, while we‚Äôre not afraid of giving responsibility to our members, we also emphasize collaboration and encourage you to focus on areas where you excel. If you have a strong background in data analysis and/or machine learning, whether from industry or academia, we‚Äôd love to hear how you would fit in!




Key Responsibilities

 * Lead our customers to transform their business processes with AI and provide expert advice on relevant data science methodologies and best practices, and design technical solutions and roadmaps that enable the change.
 * Develop and implement advanced statistical models and algorithms to solve complex business problems.
 * Design, build, and deploy scalable machine learning models and systems.
 * Optimize machine learning pipelines for performance and scalability.
 * Monitor and maintain the performance of deployed models, making improvements as needed.
 * Design, develop, and deploy generative AI models for various applications such as text generation, image synthesis, and content creation and finetune them for performance, accuracy & scalability.




Requirements

 * Experience: Minimum 5 years in analytical / data science experience in industry or academia.
 * Education: Master's degree or higher in Computer Science, Economics, Mathematics, or a related field.
 * Technical Skills: Proficiency in Python, R, SQL, and relevant ML frameworks. Experience with cloud solutions (Azure, AWS, GCP)
 * Functional Skills: Strong understanding of business processes and the ability to transform business problems to data/technical problems and further create value with implemented solutions.
 * Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to present complex information clearly and with a tendency to gain trust naturally.
 * Language: Ability to communicate in Finnish is a plus.




We offer you

We know that success depends on people and culture, not forgetting about providing you with the tools, support and resources to grow. At CGI, you'll create a career path that's right for you through exciting assignments and internal career rotation. You can also continuously develop your skills and deepen your knowledge through CGI Academy.




We offer you a job where you can develop in the direction you want, but also the opportunity to own shares of the company through our unique share purchase plan. 85% of our employees are shareholders, which is why we are called CGI Partners.




We also work flexibly when life circumstances require it. We take care of you and your wellbeing with a wide range of employee benefits, including comprehensive occupational health care, leisure insurance, childcare service when a child falls ill and bicycle benefit. By participating in CGI's wellbeing communities, you have the opportunity to get to know colleagues from all over the company through shared activities.




Find out more about us in our company-level collective agreement!




Come and build your own career path with us!

If this role could be the next step in your career, please apply by 19.9.2024. We will proceed with the recruitment process as soon as a suitable candidate is found. For more information, please contact Mikko Hid√©n, on +358 40 4897194.




A security background check may be required by the role.

description:

Would you like to develop innovative technology with superb colleagues who are top experts in their field? As a Senior Research Scientist, you have a leading role in performing cutting edge research on the applications of AI/ML for cybersecurity and/or on safeguarding the security of AI/ML systems. You will contribute to the definition of the long-term roadmap for ML & cybersecurity research in the group and contribute to its execution. You will work in customer projects and collaborative research projects with industrial and academic partners. You will write research proposals and lead collaborative research projects. You will write and communicate about your research results through peer-reviewed publications, reports, patents and oral presentations.

Our team counts 15+ researchers working on applications of ML to solve cybersecurity problems, the security of ML systems, cybersecurity testing and the security of future networks (e.g., 6G). It is a main contributor to VTT‚Äôs mission for building digital trust in society.

With VTT, you‚Äôll‚ÄØenjoy:


 * Visionary work in technology.‚ÄØWe offer positions at the cutting-edge of technology and engineering, from next-generation microelectronics and quantum technology to automation and robotics, energy systems, and more. Our research agenda is dedicated to creating sustainable growth by solving systemic and technological challenges, so your work will go towards creating a real, positive impact. Read more about our strategy ‚Äì‚ÄØ the path of exponential hope .
 * Fascinating projects, excellent research environment.‚ÄØOur researchers get to work on a combination of cutting-edge academic research and applied customer projects locally and internationally. At VTT, you'll have state-of-the-art research facilities, such as Micronova, the Finnish research infrastructure for micro-, nano-, and quantum technologies. ‚ÄØ
 * Great career opportunities, superb colleagues.‚ÄØAt VTT, excellence in research is a strategic priority. We offer long-term positions and stable career paths in top-level research. People tend to stay with us for over ten years since there are always new roles and responsibilities to grow into. Collaborating in a cross-disciplinary community with superb colleagues is a source of learning, inspiration, and fun. Read more about‚ÄØ our organisational culture as the builder of the world's most meaningful place to work.

Apply now‚ÄØand‚ÄØjoin our community of brilliant minds!

Please‚ÄØsend your CV and application with your salary request via our recruitment system as soon as possible‚ÄØbut‚ÄØat the latest by 15 September‚ÄØ2024.‚ÄØWe will process applications as they come in and fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate.‚ÄØA security clearance procedure may be conducted during the recruitment process.

description:
Sanoma Media Finland is the leading Finnish multi-channel media company. Our newspapers, magazines, tv and radio channels, online and mobile media offer information, experiences and entertainment. Our products reach most Finns every day. Join us in building media for the generations to come!




We are looking for a Competence Lead, Data Science who is passionate about coaching and people leadership.




In this role, you will lead the development of your competence team¬¥s Data Science skills, both at the team and individual levels. You will define standards and work methods and support your team members with professional challenges. You will facilitate learning, development and knowledge sharing both within and between areas of expertise in collaboration with other Competence Leads.




You will also be responsible for employee-related matters such as recruiting new talents. Typically, the Competence Lead role takes up to 50% of your working time. In addition to leadership responsibilities the expectation is that the chosen person would do Data Science -related work as a team member in one of the new multi-disciplinary teams or other business domains.

The leadership of functional goals and daily operations primarily falls under the responsibility of the multi-disciplinary team leaders, but you will support them in achieving the goals and solving the toughest challenges.




In this role, we hope you to have:

 * Strong professional expertise and passion for developing your own and others' skills
 * Experience, proven success and enthusiasm for leadership, as well as an understanding of and ability to apply the principles of coaching leadership
 * Excellent collaboration and communication skills, and the ability to create a positive work environment that enables effective and goal-oriented work
 * Experience in developing and implementing work methods or standards
 * The ability to form a long-term strategic vision for how your area of expertise should develop at Sanoma Media Finland
 * Openness to new ideas and a desire to develop them together with others




We offer you:

 * The opportunity to grow as a leader and as an expert in your area of expertise
 * An experienced team with a scientific yet lean mindset that you will help to do their best
 * A key role in a new operating model that is highly significant to Sanoma Media Finland's future success
 * Access to a modern and well maintained data infrastructure
 * A set of unique, diverse and large scale data sources to work with
 * A strong emphasis on well-being at work and a healthy work-life balance
 * Flexible remote-working options, but also a work place in Sanomatalo ‚Äì one of the nicest office buildings in Helsinki
 * Support and mentoring in your new role




Desired skills:

 * Excellent people and collaboration skills, ambition, and a desire to coach, guide, support and develop people's skills. Prior team lead experience an asset
 * A broad understanding of data science, advanced analytics, AI/machine learning methods and their fundamentals, with several years of experience in applying these methods to real world data
 * A degree in a quantitative field (e.g. machine learning, statistics, quantitative social science, operations research, bioinformatics, economics, computer science, mathematics, physics)
 * Understanding of the media and subscription business and its dynamics, from data/process levels to business outcomes would be an asset
 * Strong practical experience with modern analytics and data science tools and environments (e.g. Databricks, R, Python, SQL, GCP, AWS, Snowflake)
 * We are an international team so fluent English language is required as well as permanent work permit in Finland




Interested? Don¬¥t hesitate to apply by using the application form as we close the application process as soon as we find the perfect candidate! For more information, please contact CDO Mikko Eskola, mikko.eskola(a)sanoma.com.




Apply between 28 August 2024 and 25 September 2024 23:59 (Europe/Helsinki)

Employment type: Permanent




Benefits

 * Sports and culture benefit
 * Lunch benefit
 * Recreational clubs
 * Personnel discounts from Sanoma products
 * Sanoma personnel fund
 * Holiday cottage rentals
 * Occupational healthcare
